head.title: Arts, Briefly; Philharmonic Casts 'My Fair Lady'

identified-content.object.title: My Fair Lady (Play)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

hedline.hl1: Arts, Briefly; Philharmonic Casts 'My Fair Lady'

body.head.byline: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON; Compiled by Lawrence Van Gelder

abstract.p: New York Philharmonic annouces cast for semi-staged version of My Fair Lady; includes Kelli O'Hara, Kelsey Grammer, Charles Kimbrough, Brian Dennehy and Marni Nixon; photos (S)

block.p: The cast of the New York Philharmonic's semistaged performance of ''My Fair Lady'' from March 7 to 10 has been announced: Kelli O'Hara (''The Pajama Game''), above left, will play Eliza Doolittle, and Kelsey Grammer (''Frasier''), above right, will play Prof. Henry Higgins. Rounding out the cast will be Charles Kimbrough as Col. Pickering, Brian Dennehy as Alfred P. Doolittle and Marni Nixon as Mrs. Higgins.

The cast of the New York Philharmonic's semistaged performance of ''My Fair Lady'' from March 7 to 10 has been announced: Kelli O'Hara (''The Pajama Game''), above left, will play Eliza Doolittle, and Kelsey Grammer (''Frasier''), above right, will play Prof. Henry Higgins. Rounding out the cast will be Charles Kimbrough as Col. Pickering, Brian Dennehy as Alfred P. Doolittle and Marni Nixon as Mrs. Higgins.
